originalText.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND. Ordered one item almost 4 weeks ago and no update on when it will be shipped. You can't cancel the order, the customer service response time and responses back are garbage, and you can only do a return within 30 days of the order. So now since it's been almost that long and I still don't have the item, I won't be able to send it back or cancel the order. Pretty much just sitting on my hands waiting for something so minimal. I don't even have to wait this long for items shipped overseas to me. Highly recommend searching for dupes or buying indirectly from this brand (Ulta).

originalText.text: First time ordering their matte lipsticks. Save your $$ soooo NOT worth the price. Additionally, their packaging is all plastic, and filled with ridiculous sequins? Really?? What the heck!! Let's add more unnecessary packaging and pollute the planet! Never buying again!! Will be returning asap!!

originalText.text: Terrible customer service. Will not refund you for return of products. Do not buy from them, you will be scammed.

originalText.text: Wonderful products! Great quality. Colors are outstanding. I have tried 8 lipsticks and all of the lip pencils. Lipstick cases are unique and high- quality. I would highly recommend their products. Customer service (Christina) was the BEST!! If you want outstanding product, fabulous customer service please go to Pat McGrath website. Kathleen
